title: [SSP] 1.7版本Still Hungry——飢餓仍舊mod（好多食物啊！）
txt_content:
本帖最后由 52798165 于 2014-5-16 17:20 编辑 

           你餓嗎？安裝這個mod吧，這個mod裡面增加了大量的食物，你也可以去種植mod里新添加的植物，或去製作各種烹飪工具


你為什麼不去試試火爐呢？這個東西可以放上平底鍋來炸出美味的食物



煎锅可以使用火炉的燃料(如木材或煤)让你做某些事情,像烤？羊排或炸玉米饼



这个mod在mc里增加大量新特性。几个特性:鱿鱼现在掉肉（打死不吃）,可以煮熟還有汉堡、杯子、面粉、果酱、薯条、石油、和更多


當然不要忘了我們的樹莓蔥
初二黨翻譯不精
原文Hungry? Install this mod. The Still Hungry mod features a TON of new foods! You also get 3 extra crops to grow and some cooking tools for your convenience.    You also get a stove. The stove works using a frying pan (which is also new)!      The frying pan is used with fuel (like wood or coal) in the furnace to let you cook certain things, like lamb steak or taco shells (which make tacos)!    Worried about carrying all this food around? No worries. Use a lunchbox to hold 6 of your delicious cooked items.    This mod has a ridiculous amount of new features. To name a couple: squids now drop meat that can be cooked, you can make burgers, mugs, flour, jam, fries, oil, and much much MUCH more! For the full list of recipes and things you can make, check out the developer’s forum link.    If that wasn’t enough, this mod also gives you access to hedges of different types. Perfect for any garden:    Download the mod now, and let’s get cooking!  DownloadForumInstall Guide 

下載地址http://pan.baidu.com/s/1jGj0b6A

[groupid=594]火星地带[/groupid]

replies.author: HGK
replies.txt_content: 应该翻译成“仍然饥饿？”比较好..........

replies.author: sb023612
replies.txt_content: 标题错误，格式:适用的版本号+[ssp]或[smp]+mod英文名称和中文名称+其他

replies.author: a438132880
replies.txt_content: 你為什麼不去試試火爐呢？這個東西可以放上平底鍋來炸出美味的食
英语翻译：哔哔：饿了吗?安装这个mod。还饿国防部特性一吨新的食物!你也得3额外的作物生长和一些做饭的工具,为了您的方便。你也得到一个火炉。炉子是用煎锅(这也是新)!煎锅是用炉的燃料(如木材或煤)让你做某些事情,像羊排或taco壳(使炸玉米饼)!担心随身携带这些食物吗?不用担心。使用一个饭盒来保存6你的美味的煮熟的东西。

replies.txt_content:

你仔细看看，这还是二搬
